overview: Mayan shaman Hunbatz Men addresses a crowd of pilgrims from around the world in this historic event organized to usher in a new era of knowledge that fulfills a Mayan prophecy and marks the end of a 520-year period known as "hell time." Joining the Mayan Council for a ceremony reactivating the sacred sites at Chichen Itza, Uxmal and Palenque are author and teacher Drunvalo Melchizedek, astrologer Barbara Hand Clow and three Tibetan lamas.
title: Father Sun Speaks
